casebody.data:
[Merrimack,

June, 1882.] Ela v. Ela. Libel, for divorce. At the trial term the facts were found, a divorce was decreed, and the defendant excepted. S. C. Eastman and J. Y. Mugridge, for the plaintiff. S. Eana and C. P. Sanborn, for the defendant. Stanley, J.

There was evidence for the plaintiff on the questions of fact, and no error of law appears.

Exceptions overruled.

Allen, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
